data.title: Contact
data.meta_description: RATP Dev operates and maintains transportation systems on 4 continents, in order to make distances shorter, boost regional economies and bring people together
data.text:
For the purpose of the current Data Protection Legislation, each of RATP Dev UK Ltd(CRN 07281350), RATP Dev Transit London Ltd (CRN 13610251), London United Busways Limited (CRN 02328561) (LUB), London Sovereign Limited (CRN 02467207), London Transit Limited (CRN 13557682), and Quality Line Transport Limited (CRN 00281992) are data controllers and the relevant company will process your data for the purposes of handling of your requests, providing the services of its website and for its legitimate interest.

Their registration number with the Information Commissionerâ€™s Office in the United Kingdom (ICO) is as follows:

London United Busways Limited

ICO number: Z5663291

London Sovereign Limited

ICO number: Z8195056

Quality Line Transport Limited (previous name: H R Richmond Ltd)

ICO number: Z7396260

London Transit Limited

ICO number: ZB283008

RATP Dev Transit London Limited

ICO number: ZB284051

RATP Dev UK Limited

ICO number: ZA881657

In accordance with current Data Protection Legislation, you have the right to access, correct, delete and object to the use of your personal data. More details are available in our Privacy Policy. You may ask for your personal data to be sent to you and you have the right to give instructions for the use of your personal data after your death. You can also ask for restriction of the data, portability of the data and/or make a claim to the UK ICO.

You can download a subject access request form here and send it to us, which will help us deal with your request more efficiently. For any request, please use the contact form on this website or send your question or subject access request to the following address:

RATP Dev Transit London

Garrick House

Stamford Brook Garage

74 Chiswick High Road

London W4 1SY, England.

Attn: Data Protection Officer.
